sub_title: Project Management Professional - PMI/(PMP)®, (CAPM)®, AWS Certified Cloud Practitioner,  (One Young World Ambassador)
summary:
If you have to do everything with a small staff then you want people who can come up with at least 6 different ways to solve that problem and know the right solution to pick. You also want people who are honest about problems and won’t sugarcoat issues and you defiantly want people who have a mash-up of a lot of skills and experiences. 
In fact you need PM Professionals. So if you are looking for one, then you are looking at the right profile!
I am a Project Management Professional with a solid experience in bringing new products to market both as a project manager and technical consultant. Always thrive to deliver superior implementations globally on commercialized solutions, ensuring customer satisfaction and business efficiency. 

Specialties: 
-----------------
* Project Management | Business Analysis | Workflow development | Solutions Implementations | Process improvements | Root Cause Analysis | Opportunities and investment analysis | Planning & Scheduling | Risk management | Change management | Resource management |Trainings | Customer management | Communication management
* Tools – MS Project | MS Office | MS Visio | SharePoint | Primavera | Minitab | SalesForce.com | ServiceMax | VMware | Teams | OneNote

profile_positions.description: Project manage the implementation of complex software products for oncology customers. Oncology Informatics & Genomics is an exciting portfolio of products (Lung Cancer Orchestrator, Pathways, Genomics, and others) that helps to make the lives of busy clinicians and hospital staff easier, while ultimately driving better outcomes for patients.
profile_positions.title: Implementation Manager - Oncology Informatics & Genomics (OIG)

profile_positions.description:
-  Prepares project timelines for innovative cardiac assay product development
- Defines project deliverables , monitor status of tasks and enforce deadlines
- Actively own and drive projects including the development and execution of project plans,
ensuring delivery of technical and business requirements within approved budget and
timeline
- Proactively manages cross functional teams (locally and remotely) to assure timely market
driven commercial product launch dates
- Proactively manages cross functional teams (locally and remotely) to assure efficient
technical transfer of new products/processes to manufacturing organization
- Deliver status reports to stakeholders for budgeting and planning purposes
- Manages third-party operations in the development and/or manufacture of company
product
- Assist business development in closing new opportunities
- Build high performing team dynamics by leading regular team meetings and ensuring
effective communication, motivation, accountability, and conflict resolution
- Effectively engage stakeholders and senior business leaders to ensure alignment throughout
the project timelines and to ensure sound business decisions by providing options,
recommendations, and rationale. Drive toward the right business decisions, even when the
outcome is not desired
profile_positions.title: Research and Development Project Manager

profile_positions.description:
• Own and drive improvement projects including the development and execution of project
plans, ensuring delivery of business requirements within approved budget , scope and  timeline
• Being the voice in Vedlhoven for the regional EUV Install teams to prepare and arrange
training in coordination with Factory, D&E, Training Centers, and HR.
• Own and drive engineers' skill and knowledge growth to meet agreed Install teams
blueprint capability and improvements by maintaining the Skill Matrix.
• Coordinate with the regions to prepare 6 quarters EUV install training forecast, in-line with
the latest agreed Business Line capability, to secure required slots toward training
departments.
• Set up, implement and maintain training programs for (to be/new hire) EUV engineers,
coordinates, operation leaders and related roles in the CS EUV Install department.
• Support CS Field operations teams' skill improvement to ensure site self-sufficient EUV
installs and local solving power.
profile_positions.title: Sr. Project Lead -Training/ Knowledge Management

profile_positions.description:
- Main contact point for customer as well as departments within DCP for given project or program
- Initiate the project or program through required processes and internal/external kick-off meetings
- Create, manage and execute implementation plans and schedules, including complete site coordination as well as customer education and consultation as required.
- Manage and communicate on a high level of professionalism to consultants and suppliers of information systems connected to DCP.
- Responsible for successful DCP implementation and customer acceptance, within the agreed upon timeframe, of the delivered digital pathology solution.
- Review feedback from customers, compile and analyze support data and recommend technical changes as appropriate.
- Support in driving for success and 100% digitization of selected customers
profile_positions.title: Implementation Manager -  Digital Pathology Solutions ,Customer Operations

profile_positions.description:
Project Manager:
- Lead role as Project Manager for new product introduction (Minicare Handheld devices), product lifecycle, distributor channel, supply chain and manufacturing (including integration of factory and commercial SAP systems)
- Actively own and drive projects including the development and execution of project plans, ensuring delivery of technical and business requirements within approved budget and timeline
- Build high performing team dynamics by leading regular team meetings and ensuring effective communication, motivation, accountability, and conflict resolution
- Effectively engage stakeholders and senior business leaders to ensure alignment throughout the project timelines and to ensure sound business decisions by providing options, recommendations, and rationale. Drive toward the right business decisions, even when the outcome is not desired.
- Responsible and owner of countries roll-out planning and organization readiness to launch products
- Creation a deployment of the commercial SharePoint for Handheld Diagnostics organization

Field Service Engineer:
- Responsible of product Installed-Base Management including onboarding local markets on our ways of working
- Technical product maintenance of Minicare devices and upgrade them when required
- Installation and training of Minicare devices at Customer sites and/ or remotely 
- Responsible for making sure that all orders of the customers are delivered on time
- Responsible of creating KPIs for Customer Service department and maintaining them: Product Failure Rate, Complaint and Feedback Handling, Field Change Orders, Customer Satisfaction, Swap and Returns
profile_positions.title: Project Manager/Field Service Engineer - Handheld Diagnostics Operations
